skills.name: Install Million
skills.pattern: npm install million

skills.name: Vite Plugin
skills.pattern: import million from 'million/compiler'; export default { plugins: [million.vite({ auto: true })] }

skills.name: Next.js Plugin
skills.pattern: const million = require('million/compiler'); module.exports = million.next({ auto: true })

skills.name: Webpack Plugin
skills.pattern: const million = require('million/compiler'); plugins: [million.webpack({ auto: true })]

skills.name: Block Virtual DOM
skills.pattern: Million compiles React components to block virtual DOM for 70% faster updates

skills.name: Auto Mode
skills.pattern: auto: true // automatically optimizes compatible components

skills.name: block()
skills.pattern: import { block } from 'million/react'; const MyBlock = block(MyComponent)

skills.name: Block Component
skills.pattern:
const Counter = block(({ count }) =>
{count}
)

skills.pattern:
import { For } from 'million/react'; {(item) =>
  • {item}

skills.name: For with Key
skills.pattern:
{(item, i) =>
  • {item.name}
    • }

skills.name: Compiler
skills.pattern: Million compiler analyzes and transforms React components at build time

skills.name: Skip
skills.pattern:
// million-skip
function MyComponent() { ... }

skills.name: Ignore
skills.pattern: 'use no million'; // at top of file to skip entire file

skills.name: Deterministic
skills.pattern: Components must have deterministic return values (same props = same output)

skills.name: No Spread
skills.pattern: Avoid {...props} spread on DOM elements in blocks

skills.name: Stable Components
skills.pattern: Components inside blocks should be stable (not created inline)

skills.name: No Dynamic Tags
skills.pattern: Avoid dynamic tag names like <Component /> where Component varies

skills.name: SSR Support
skills.pattern: Million works with SSR frameworks like Next.js, Remix, Astro

skills.name: Hydration
skills.pattern: Blocks hydrate efficiently, reusing server-rendered DOM

skills.name: React DevTools
skills.pattern: Million components appear in React DevTools for debugging

skills.name: Benchmarks
skills.pattern: Million can make React apps up to 70% faster in updates

skills.name: Memory
skills.pattern: Block virtual DOM uses less memory than traditional VDOM

skills.name: React Compatible
skills.pattern: Works with React hooks, context, and most React patterns

skills.name: Preact
skills.pattern: import { block } from 'million/preact'; // Preact version

skills.name: Threshold
skills.pattern: million.vite({ auto: { threshold: 0.05 } })

skills.name: RSC
skills.pattern: million.next({ auto: true, rsc: true })

skills.name: ESLint Plugin
skills.pattern: npm install eslint-plugin-million; extends: ['plugin:million/recommended']

skills.name: Static Analysis
skills.pattern: Compiler detects which parts of JSX are static vs dynamic

skills.name: Granular Updates
skills.pattern: Only dynamic parts update, not entire component tree

skills.name: Incremental Adoption
skills.pattern: Start with auto: true, manually wrap performance-critical components
